ModMetaData.name: [1.2][1.3][1.4]Level This!
ModMetaData.author: Jdalt40
ModMetaData.description:
<color=#7c0a02>There can be only one!</color> This mod introduces staggering new gameplay, a health levelling system. Start as a Level 0 Colonist and work your way up to the doomsday launcher absorbing Level 100 Pirate Boss!
Forked from Jdalt40. Do not credit me, all I did is move some files. As of October 31st 2022. The Mod is now compatible with 1.4 Update.
Fix : 1.4 Compatible
Added : None
New Compatibility : None
If the original mod creator wishes for me to delete it and take the files I have created he can contact me.
